{{also|auto|autó|aùto|autō|aŭto|auto-|Auto.|Appendix:Variations of "auto"}} ==English== ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun}} # An unincorporated community in [[West Virginia]] ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=aotu|aout|outa}} [[Category:en:West Virginia, USA]] ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== Shortened from {{m|de|Automobil}}, from {{der|de|fr|automobile}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈaʊ̯toː/|[ˈʔaʊ̯tʰoː]}} * {{audio|de|De-Auto.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Auto.ogg|Audio (Austria)}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n||Autos}} # [[car]] #: ''Das ist das '''Auto''' meines Vaters.'' #:: That is my father’s '''car'''. ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|s|s}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|KFZ}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Autostraße}} * {{l|de|Autoverkehr}} * {{l|de|Autotürschloss}} * {{l|de|Autotür}} * {{l|de|Autohaus}} * {{l|de|Autohof}} [[Category:de:Vehicles]] ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|hrx|auto||Wiesemann spelling system}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/ˈaʊ̯to/}} ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=n|plural|Autos}} # [[car]] #: {{ux|hrx|Er hod en neies '''Auto''' kaafd.|He bought a new '''car'''.}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|hrx|Karre}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary] ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/ˈau̯to/|[ˈɑʊ̯to]}} ===Noun=== {{lb-noun|m}} # [[car]] ====Synonyms==== * {{l|lb|Won}} [[Category:lb:Transport]] [[Category:lb:Vehicles]]
